nodes.name: setupWhitelist
mint
transfer

mint
transfer

approve

burnFor

allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params._owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params._spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Overrides StandardToken approve() adding the whitelist validation

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

approve(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The address to query the the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

burnFor(address,uint256).details: new function to burn tokens from a centralized owner

params._value: The amount of tokens to burn.
params._who: The address which will be burned.

burnFor(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

decreaseApproval(address,uint256).details: Overrides StandardToken decreaseApproval() adding the whitelist validation

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._subtractedValue: The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by.

decreaseApproval(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

finishMinting().details: Function to stop minting new tokens.
finishMinting().return: True if the operation was successful.

increaseApproval(address,uint256).details: Overrides StandardToken increaseApproval() adding the whitelist validation

params._addedValue: The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.
params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.

increaseApproval(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

mint(address,uint256).details: Overrides MintableToken mint() adding the whitelist validation

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint.
params._to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.

mint(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setupWhitelist(address).details: Sets up the centralized whitelist contract
setupWhitelist(address).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens in existence

transfer(address,uint256).details: Overrides BasicToken transfer() adding the whitelist validation
transfer(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Overrides StandardToken transferFrom() adding the whitelist validation

params._from: address The address which you want to send tokens from
params._to: address The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
